item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: 1. Definitions We collect certain identifying personal data when you sign up to our Service such as your name, email address, PayPal address (if different from email address), and telephone number. The personal data we collect from you is disclosed only in accordance with our Terms of Service and/or this Privacy Policy.Conclude collects Slack account and access information from Users for the purposes of connecting to the Slack API and to authenticate access to information on the Conclude website.

item.title: Accepted Papers
item.description: Oral Is Normalization Indispensable for Multi-domain Federated Learning?. Weiming Zhuang, Lingjuan Lyu Distributed Personalized Empirical Risk Minimization. Yuyang Deng, Mohammad Mahdi Kamani, Pouria Mahdavinia, Mehrdad Mahdavi Poster Once-for-All Federated Learning: Learning From and Deploying to Heterogeneous Clients. Kamala Varma, Enmao Diao, Tanya Roosta, Jie Ding, Tao Zhang SparseVFL: Communication-Efficient Vertical Federated Learning Based on Sparsification of Embeddings and Gradients. Yoshitaka Inoue, Hiroki Moriya, Qiong Zhang, Kris Skrinak Optimization of User Resources in Federated Learning for Urban Sensing Applications.

item.title: Call for Submissions
item.description: Workshop Scope By hosting this workshop at SIGKDD, we hope to promote the development of federated learning as a scientific field and encourage data mining researchers and practitioners to collaborate on this important research topic. We envision the workshop will bring in an overall advancement of FL and broaden its impact in the data mining research and industrial community, while FL has become an increasingly important tool for data mining in recent years.

item.title: Organizers
item.description: Workshop Committees Junyuan Hong, Michigan State University

item.title: Schedules
item.description: Workshop Schedule (Pacific Timezone) Time Event Event -- 8:00 am - 8:30 am Opening Ceremony 8:30 am - 09:15 am Keynote Talk 1: Jian Pei 9:15 am - 10:00 am Keynote Talk 2: Salman Avestimehr 10:00 am - 10:45 am Keynote Talk 3: Yiran Chen 10:45 am - 11:30 am Keynote Talk 4: Aidong Zhang 11:30 am - 12:20 pm Oral Presentation 12:20 pm - 12:50 pm Lunch Break 12:50 am - 1:35 pm Keynote Talk 5: Carl Yang 1:35 pm - 2:20 pm Keynote Talk 6: Heiko Ludwig 2:20 pm - 3:05 pm Keynote Talk 7: Tian Li 3:05 pm - 4:20 pm Keynote Talk 8: Ananda T.
